name: Five Nights at Wario's 4
summary:
Five Nights at Wario's 4 is the 5th game in the series. The gameplay is in a style never seen before in a FNAF fan game :) I know I said I wouldn't make more FNAW games, but minds can change, and mine did. Fan games aren't hurting anybody, right? They're something I have fun making, and I choose to share them with you to play for free if you feel like it. So I don't feel this should be a bad thing for anybody.
The game takes places entierly on a TV screen... but is it real? Or are they just a dream? This is most likely them most challenging FNAW game out of them all. Can you beat all nights, and unlock the secret, new gamemode?
